## 6. MOUNTAIN
### Definition
Most generic substantive for a considerable rise in the surface of the Earth, typically with steep slopes. Avoid terms for specific types of mountain. Avoid terms for smaller rises, e.g. "mound, hill". Avoid terms for parts of a mountain, e.g. "peak". (CoBL)

### Contexts
1. There is a plain and many mountains in Daghestan. 2. It takes a whole day to climb this mountain. (GLD)
